document_data.name: Gzelder "Yellow Hand" Yespar
document_data.mainbody: '''Gzelder "Yellow Hand" Yespar''' was a [[human]] reformed rogue who lived in [[Espar]], [[Cormyr]] as of [[1368 DR]]. He spent his time helping out at the local shrine to [[Helm]], acting as a [[Heralds (local)|herald]] for Lord [[Hezom]].
